Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

Is there any mod available which allows to switch the 'icon' view to a detail view. Something like Windows Explorer has, parts listed vertically, and details like mass, thrust, isp, tank size (customized columns) horizontally . You should also be able to sort for things like twr, or cost per kg or whatever.

Cheers

Pretty sure such a thing doesn't exist, sorry. Maybe you can find at least parts of what you're looking for in Editor Extensions, though?

Edited August 31, 2016 by Streetwind
